alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:26PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sierra, southeastern Lassen and southern Washoe Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 425 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lemmon Valley, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reno, Stead, Lemmon Valley, Cold Springs, Cold Springs Valley, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Golden Valley, Spanish Springs, Stead Airport, Us 395 At Calif-Nevada Line Near Bordertown and Sun Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
